thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural To Boost Unit's Capital By 170 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural To Boost Unit's Capital By 170 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: jiangsu provincial agricultural reclamation and development co ltd
brief-jiangsu provincial agricultural to boost unit

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BOOST UNIT'S CAPITAL BY 170 MILLION YUAN ($26.56 million) TO 500 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2rusf0S Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4003 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
